message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $15000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but $10000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $13000. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $13000 is a bit too high. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll offer $11000. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob. However, I'm still a bit above $11000. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $12500. What do you think?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still not comfortable with $12500. I'll offer $11500. Can you meet me at this price?
I understand you're getting close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $12200. This is as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still not at my limit. I'll offer $11800. Can you meet me at this price?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $12000, Bob. I've already compromised quite a bit. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your latest offer, so I'll offer it to you for $11900. This is my final offer. What do you think?
